column5: hey all been making a lot of baits lately and i guess u could say i wanna show off, here is a bait i made tonight..  What does everyone think? IT weighs in at around 2.5oz i put a toonie in the pic to give u an idea of size.. thats a 6/0 salt water hook and those are heavy duty "extra" thick blades not positive on exact size.. Black and red maribou with bucktail at each end for neatness...  Thanks all Curtis...
Just what I've been looking for.  Can I have it with brass blades and will it be ready for pick up tonight?  Good looking bait.
Sure can I have it all in stock hehe
